title: "We have equal rights" | Muslims stopped from Ramadan prayers in Noida housing complex
comments:
Articulate, educated and peaceful request following proper channels.

This approach will always win hearts and minds.

We do all kinds of community Pujas in our homes - Satya Narayan Puja, navratri, vat Savitri, Shani mela,  Ganesh chaturthi. 

So No Logic in denying "them"  their religious gatherings - "in their own homes."
Well there is a logic. They are not comfortable saying it aloud.

>This approach will always win hearts and minds.

Will it? Their neighbours are the kind of people who cheer at the news of massacre of muslims.
Gunde apartment me rande nachayein tab Noida waalon ko dikkat nahi. But few people peacefully praying without disturbing them is an infringement of their rights.
